item.title: Shapefiles in R using sf package
item.description: The following is based on a workshop I prepared for the whyR conference. Handling shapefiles is one of the awesome things that R enables us to do. You donâ€™t need to learn any specialized tools like ArcGIS or QGIS. All you need is R.
